title: How I got into coding
abstract: From Amstrad and BASIC, as a kid, to microcontrollers and, after, Javascript with React. It was a fun, long way discovering the coding world.

title: Javascript, a versatile, powerful language
abstract: Javascript seems to have swept the web development board. What can this coding language offer to web developers 26 years after its birth?

title: React overview
abstract: React is such a useful tool to build web apps, once you understand it. Modularization and dependency injection are the key.
